questions.question: A cloud designed to be shared by several organizations. Access is granted only to the users within the organizations who are sharing the community cloud infrastructure.

A cloud in which a business or organization’s services are provided to and used by people outside the organization. The cloud is publicly accessible, and the cloud owner is responsible for the cloud’s infrastructure.
A cloud used by a single business or organization. Access to the private cloud is granted only to users within the organization.
A cloud that uses components of a public cloud and a private cloud.
A software program used to create and manage virtual machines.
A virtual machine that runs on top of a hypervisor.
The physical computer or OS that runs the hypervisor.
